itemDescription: Welsh rugby union and rugby league footballer (1904-1951)

wikipedia_page.main: David "Dai" Jenkins (12 April 1904 – 13 August 1951) was a Welsh dual-code international rugby footballer who played rugby union for Swansea and rugby league for Leeds RLFC, and representing internationally in both sports.
